channel.title: Brandon Noskoviak
channel.description: Writing on AI agents, product management, and building things.

item.title: How I Used an AI Agent to Discover Malware, Transfer My Domain, and Fight Shopify Support
item.description: A real-world case study of Claude's Cowork mode managing an entire incident response — from discovery to remediation to customer support negotiation.

item.title: I Built My Entire Portfolio Site Through Conversation
item.description: How I used Anthropic's Claude in Cowork mode to build a 70K single-file portfolio site with glassmorphism, scroll physics, analytics, and an interactive tour — all through conversation.
